Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Enacts the New York gift certificate scam prevention act
Summary: Enacts the "New York gift certificate scam prevention act" to require certain sale, security and record-keeping requirements for gift certificates by sellers of gift certificates.
LawCode: Amd ยง396-i, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to enacting the "New York gift certificate scam prevention act"
